entries.meaning: (sports, recreation) A narrow, wooden or plastic platform mounted on pairs of wheels, on which one stands and propels oneself by pushing along the ground with one foot.
(automotive) A vehicle chassis format, used for electric vehicles, which holds the drive motors and power energy store (ie. batteries), forming the vehicular base.

verbs.description: skateboard (third-person singular simple present skateboards, present participle skateboarding, simple past and past participle skateboarded)
